item.title: The majority of Canadian citizen is not satisfied with the performance of the federal government under Justin Trudeau
item.description: Abstract Using the phone survey from 2019 Canadian Election Study, we investigated whether the participants are satisfied with the performance of the federal government under Justin Trudeau. By plotting the response of the quenstionaire, we discover that \(54.3\%\) of the participants is not satisfied with the performance. This suggests that Justin Trudeau will lost some votes in the new election. Introduction We used the dataset of the phone survey from 2019 Canadian Election Study to investigate the satisfactory level of the adult Canadian citizens to the performance of the federal government under Justin Trudeau.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
